name: calculate_exercise_target_heart_rate
description: Calculates the target heart rate for exercise based on the individual"s age and the intensity percentage of the exercise. The target heart rate is calculated using the formula: (max_heart_rate - 60) * (intensity_percentage / 100) + 60, where max_heart_rate is 220 - age.

age.description: The age of the individual in years.

intensity_percentage.description: The intensity of the exercise as a percentage, typically between 50% and 85%.
